results.name: Expansion of 1/sqrt(1+4*x+12*x^2).
comment: Apart from signs identical this is to A098336. - _Joerg Arndt_, Jun 30 2013
Fourth binomial transform of the expansion of 1/sqrt(1-4*x+12*x^2), A098336.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Hacène Belbachir, Abdelghani Mehdaoui, László Szalay, Diagonal Sums in the Pascal Pyramid, II: Applications, J. Int. Seq., Vol. 22 (2019), Article 19.3.5.
formula: D-finite with recurrence: n*a(n) +2*(2*n-1)*a(n-1) +12*(n-1)*a(n-2)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 07 2012
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Feb 04 2006
